subject: Dearest Friend
body:
Hi Dear,

Sorry to invade your privacy, I am Mrs. Daniella Kyle the wife of Mr Angelo
Kyle,my husband worked with Central Bank Of Philippines for ten years
before he died in the year 2012. When my late husband was alive he
deposited sum amount of Money with a Bank in UK, Presently,this money is
still
with the Bank,I am in a hospital in Philippines receiving treatment and my
doctor has confirmed to me that i have just few days to live on earth due
to my esophageal cancer.Please i am choosing you to receive this money on
my behalf,and use it
to help the less privilege.

As soon as I receive your response I shall give you the contact information
of my bank in Europe as they will be the one to assist you in laying claims
for this money. I would also appreciate your response through my private
email: daniellakyle015@proton.me

Your Sister in Christ,
Mrs. Daniella Kyle

subject: Re: Dearest Friend
body:
Hello Mrs. Daniella Kyle,

I'm deeply touched by your message and I'm sorry to hear about your current health condition. It's very noble of you to think about helping the less privileged even in such difficult times.

Could you please share more details about how this process would work? How can I ensure that the funds will be used for the intended purpose?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brian

subject: Re: Dearest Friend
body:
Hello Mrs. Daniella Kyle,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition and the passing of your husband. It's quite a noble cause that you want to help the less privileged with the money.

Could you please tell me more about how I can assist in this process? Also, could you share more details about the bank where the money is deposited?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brian
